title: lil17th
author: lil17th
content: Hello friends, I am selling my personal telegram channel, which brought me a lot of money on the sale of the VIP channelAfter the purchase, you become the owner of the channel (forever), if for example 10 people buy your VIP channel, you will earn $ 2,000, and if 100 people, you will earn $ 20,000, I will also give you the VIP channel and you will become its owner.Only today such a price for the channel, have time to buyChannel - https://t.me/CryptoZeusMasterPrice: $1499Payment in cryptocurrency onlyThe reason for the sale: money is urgently needed, there is not enough for the trip.Write to telegram: https://t.me/lil17_thI AM READY TO CONDUCT A TRANSACTION USING ESCROW
